title: New Trolls - Concerto Grosso Trilogy Live
description:
New Trolls - Concerto Grosso Trilogy Live 

Year: 2007
Genre: Art rock
Quality: DVD 9
Video: MPEG-2, PAL, 16:9 (720x576), VBR, 25.00 fps, 5900 Kbps
Audio : PCM, 2 ch, 1536 Kbps, 16-bit, 48 KHz 
Duration: 02:03:52 + 00:07:59

Members: 
Vittorio De Scalzi - vocals, keyboards, classic guitar, flute
Nico Di Palo - vocals, keyboards

Guest musicians:
Alfio Vitanza - drums, vocals
Andrea Maddalone - acoustic and electric guitar, vocals
Mauro Sposito - acoustic and electric guitar, vocals
Francesco Bellia - bass, vocals

with orchestra conducted by Stefano Chiabrera

Tracklist:
01. Nella sala vuota 
02. Allegro
03. Adagio (Shadows)
04. Fireworks
05. Cadenza - Andante con Moto
06. My shadow in the dark (per Jimy Hendrix)

09. 3* tempo: Moderato (Fare you well dove)
10. Quiet seas
11. Le Roi Soleil
12. The knowledge (overture)
13. Dance with rain (ballata)
14. Future joy (scherzo)
15. High education (cello cadenza)
16. The seventh season (ostinato)
17. The ray of white light (rondo)
18. One magic night (larghetto)

20. Intro and canone
